name: Doodle Wars
description:
Fight your way through waves of Doodle monsters before you get erased from the pages. Doodle wars is a side scrolling, beat em up game. When the enemies hit you, the player starts to fade out. But if the player hits the monsters then he fades back in. Once you are completely faded out the game is over.

Click PLAY to start the game.

Instructions:

W - move left         J - swing Heavy sword (one shots enemies, but slow)

D - move right       K - swing Light sword (low damage but fast)  

SPACE - dash (to the direction you are holding)
